data.name: Eternal Concord
data.detailed_description:
Forge your own unique team of characters and dive into a journey to redeem yourselves - and the entire world - from an evil within...

Experience the first full-length JRPG from the one-man development team Dunamis Games!

‚öîÔ∏è Features ‚öîÔ∏è
‚òÖ A main story with over 10 hours of content
‚òÖ Every game is different! Choose your team from 8 different character classes, from the Blacksmith to the Wizard.
‚òÖ Over 130 enemies spread across various locations, from dry desert and barren mountains to lush forests and deep caves
‚òÖ Travel by land, sea, or air across the vast world of Concordia
‚òÖ When you're done with the main story, discover side quests and dungeons to continue your adventure!
‚òÖ Fight the world's most difficult bosses in the Monster Arena
‚òÖ Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo

Do you have what it takes? Begin your adventure and find out!

data.short_description: Forge your own unique team of characters and dive into a journey to redeem yourselves - and the entire world - from an evil within...
data.reviews:
‚ÄúThis is a very good and interesting game, with some unique features. The balance between difficulty and leveling up is solid, and the arena battles are challenging and engaging.‚Äù
5/5 ‚Äì Link

‚ÄúI've enjoyed the best rpg's for well over 20 years now. Eternal Concord does not disappoint. Very well done. I'll be watching for future releases. I believe you could easily design more fleshed out console rpg's with great success!üëçüëç‚Äù
5/5 ‚Äì Link

‚ÄúIf you enjoyed Dragon Warrior/Dragonquest, Final Fantasy I, and Golden Sun then you will love this game.‚Äù
5/5 ‚Äì Link

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2, Debian 8, Ubuntu 16.04, CentOS/RHEL 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If the included Debian executable does not run, please use EternalConcord.sh provided.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 2, Debian 8, Ubuntu 19.04, CentOS/RHEL 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If the included Debian executable does not run, please use EternalConcord.sh provided.
